gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 127, Mavericks 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers defeated the Mavericks, 127-110. D’Angelo Russell (29 points, four rebounds, three assists) and Anthony Davis (28 points, 12 rebounds, nine assists) led the Lakers as LeBron James added 25 points, 12 rebounds, and nine assists as the Lakers starting five scored 105 of the 127 total points. Luka Doncic led Dallas with 33 points, 13 rebounds, and 10 assists. The Lakers have won their second consecutive game and are back to .500 at 21-21 as the Mavericks move to 24-18.
